creator: BFDM@gmx.de
text:
Dear xindice team,

I have downloaded newest version of xindice both as server (war) and jar. 
The deployment went fine, but I could not perform the "xindice" command, because
the file ${xindice_home}/config/commands.xml were not found:   

java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Programme\xindice-1.1b3\config\commands.xml (D
as System kann den angegebenen Pfad nicht finden)
        at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method)
        at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:106)
        at org.apache.xindice.tools.XMLTools.initCommandsDocument(XMLTools.java:
185)
        at org.apache.xindice.tools.XMLTools.init(XMLTools.java:171)
        at org.apache.xindice.tools.XMLTools.process(XMLTools.java:210)
        at org.apache.xindice.tools.XMLTools.main(XMLTools.java:124)
ERROR : C:\Programme\xindice-1.1b3\config\commands.xml (Das System kann den ange
gebenen Pfad nicht finden)

I got an old commands.xml and copied into the config dir and it seems to be
allright now.

From now on (since yesterday or so, in CVS) all three releases will contain
commands.xml file, as well as scripts to run XMLTools.
creator: vgritsenko@apache.org
